backend/main.mo: Motoko canister with health check, event logging with access control, and feature specification queries for planned UI pages.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing various frontend components, hooks, pages, and documentation files.
frontend/docs/data-architecture.md: Explains authentication, role handling, admin bootstrap, and React Query–based data flows in the frontend.
frontend/docs/design-direction.md: Design guidelines detailing the dark‑fantasy theme, colors, typography, spacing, and interactive styles.
frontend/docs/local-storage-strategy.md: Describes local storage categories, canister‑backed data, React Query invalidation, and offline support.
frontend/docs/phase1-features-by-page.md: Lists Phase 1 page structures and future enhancements for all site pages including shop, dashboard, and admin.
frontend/docs/phase1-planning.md: Outlines project architecture, site map, access levels, and Phase 1 scope for the application.
frontend/docs/phase6-qa-test-plan.md: Provides detailed manual QA test cases for authentication, access control, and shop behaviors across devices.
Describes the workflow for feedback collection, offline support, admin review, and iterative feature updates.
frontend/docs/production-deployment.md: Covers backend and frontend deployment steps for IC, Vercel, and Netlify along with required environment variables.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and app-wide light/dark theme design tokens using CSS variables.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the React app with metadata, favicon, and root mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the main React app with routing, lazy‑loaded pages, analytics init, React Query, theming, and global error handling.
frontend/src/components/about/TeamSectio: Renders a grid of flip‑card profiles for team members with bios, roles, and expertise.
frontend/src/components/about/TimelineSe: Displays a vertical timeline of company milestones using styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminFeedb: Fetches and displays user feedback with search and category filters, status badges, and error/loading states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOrder: Shows all orders with filters for order ID and user principal, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProdu: Manages product CRUD operations including creation, editing, and stock updates with dialogs, validation, and queued mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUsers: Provides UI and logic for granting and revoking admin roles using principal validation and queued mutations with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles login/logout via Internet Identity, clearing caches on logout and showing appropriate button states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a modal form for collecting and saving a user's name and email before continuing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Protects admin-only content by checking authentication and admin role, showing access or login prompts when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Restricts access to authenticated users, prompting login when identity is missing or initializing.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactP: Renders a FAQ accordion with predefined questions and answers about shipping, returns, and artifact care.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/GuildO: Fetches and displays guild orders with loading, error, and empty states, listing quests with status and rewards.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Invent: Manages and displays the shopping cart, mapping products, calculating totals, and handling checkout via queued orders.
frontend/src/components/effects/FadeInSe: Fades in child content when scrolled into view, respecting reduced-motion settings.
frontend/src/components/effects/FlipCard: Interactive flip card component with keyboard support and motion-reduction handling.
frontend/src/components/effects/Parallax: Applies a scroll-based parallax transform using requestAnimationFrame with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Feedbac: Feedback form dialog with draft persistence, identity checks, and queued offline submission.
Small launcher button that opens the feedback dialog.
frontend/src/components/home/Announcemen: Displays a list of static announcement cards with badges and dates.
frontend/src/components/home/FeaturedCar: Carousel for featured shop items with navigation and indicator controls.
frontend/src/components/home/QuickLinksG: Grid of navigational cards linking to major site sections.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines main app layout with background, header, footer, quotes, routing outlet, analytics, and offline status.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with navigation links, support links, legal links, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive header navigation with desktop and mobile menus, route-based menu closing, and scroll locking.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Simple layout wrapper that renders an optional title and description above page content.
frontend/src/components/quotes/RandomQuo: Displays up to three random quotes using a custom hook and styled cards.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Accordion component listing detailed service descriptions with icons, summaries, and feature lists.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductDeta: Product detail modal with price, stock status, description, save/unsave logic, and add-to-cart actions.
frontend/src/components/shop/useShopFilt: Hook providing search query state and memoized product filtering by name or description.
frontend/src/components/system/Analytics: Tracks initial and subsequent page views using router navigation events and user actor info.
frontend/src/components/system/AppErrorB: Top-level error boundary that logs errors, displays a recovery UI, and allows reload or troubleshooting.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorStat: Reusable error display showing offline or generic errors with an optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/system/OfflineSy: Dialog UI for viewing, retrying, and managing queued offline mutations with support for removing and clearing failed actions.
Floating status indicator showing offline sync progress, errors, and access to the queue dialog.
frontend/src/components/system/Troublesh: Dialog for displaying, inspecting, and clearing locally stored error logs with timestamps and stack traces.
frontend/src/data/quotes.ts: Exports a list of static themed quotes used throughout the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlobalErrorCapture: Registers global handlers to log runtime errors and unhandled promise rejections to local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout handling, and identity persistence via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Custom hook using IntersectionObserver to track when an element enters the viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalCart.ts: Manages a persistent local cart with add, remove, quantity updates, and total calculations stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineDrafts.ts: Manages saving, loading, and clearing form drafts in localStorage with expiry handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineMutationRep: Replays queued offline mutations when online, with retry logic, error tracking, and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using window events.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects user reduced‑motion preference with cross‑browser media query support.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, products, and related backend data.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueuedMutations.ts: Queues mutations for offline use and executes them when online, falling back to local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useRandomQuotes.ts: Returns random quotes that refresh when the route changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentlyViewed.ts: Tracks recently viewed products in localStorage with automatic pruning and expiry.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionState.ts: Persists component state across a session using localStorage with session ID and expiry.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, color schemes, typography, animations, and utility classes using Tailwind and OKLCH colors.
frontend/src/lib/analytics.ts: Implements configurable analytics with first‑party logging or Google Analytics, including script injection and event/pageview tracking.
frontend/src/lib/errorLogging.ts: Provides local client-side error logging with sanitization, size limits, and utilities to read, write, and clear logs.
frontend/src/lib/localStorage.ts: Defines versioned, fault‑tolerant localStorage utilities with expiry handling and cleanup helpers.
frontend/src/lib/offlineMutationQueue.ts: Manages a versioned offline mutation queue with enqueue, update, retry, and clear operations stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/randomQuotes.ts: Selects 2–3 unique random quotes from a predefined list without repetition.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity context providers.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders an About page describing the creator, mission, and values using styled sections and animations.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Displays an admin panel with tabs for managing products, orders, users, and feedback, gated by admin access.
frontend/src/pages/BlogLore.tsx: Shows a list of styled lore-themed blog post cards with metadata and fade-in effects.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Renders a contact form with input fields and handles simulated submission with toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays a user dashboard with tabs for profile, orders, saved items, cart, and quests using various data queries.
frontend/src/pages/FAQ.tsx: Shows a searchable FAQ list with categorized questions and answers in an accordion layout.
frontend/src/pages/Homepage.tsx: Builds the homepage with a hero section, featured carousel, quick links, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/Privacy.tsx: Presents the site's privacy policy with sectioned explanations of data practices and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Displays available services via an accordion and includes a call-to-action for custom service inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/Shop.tsx: Implements the Shop page with product fetching, filtering, view toggling, and a memoized product card component with modal details.
frontend/src/pages/Terms.tsx: Renders the Terms of Service page using styled sections inside a PageLayout with fade-in effects.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins for the project's fantasy-themed UI.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, scope changes, architecture notes, and known issues including backend conflicts and deployment errors.
